actions.description: Orcus makes three Wand of Orcus, Tail, or Necrotic Bolt attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 19 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (3d8 + 11) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (2d12) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Wand of Orcus

actions.description: 16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) force damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage.
actions.name: Tail

actions.description: 15 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 29 (5d8 + 7) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Necrotic Bolt

actions.description: While holding the Wand of Orcus, Orcus conjures Undead creatures whose combined average hit points don't exceed 500. These creatures magically rise up from the ground or otherwise form in unoccupied spaces within 300 feet of Orcus and obey his commands until they are destroyed or until he dismisses them as an action.
actions.name: Conjure Undead (1/Day)

actions.description:
Orcus casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 23):
At will: detect magic

1/day each: time stop

3/day each: dispel magic
actions.name: Spellcasting

actions.description:
While holding the Wand of Orcus, Orcus casts one of the following spells (spell save DC 18), some of which require charges; the wand has 7 charges to fuel these spells, and it regains 1d4 + 3 charges daily at dawn:
At will: animate dead (as an action), blight, speak with dead
actions.name: Wand Spellcasting

actions.description: Orcus makes one Tail or Necrotic Bolt attack.
actions.name: Attack

actions.description: Orcus chooses a point on the ground that he can see within 100 feet of him. A cylinder of swirling necrotic energy 60 feet tall and with a 10-foot radius rises from that point and lasts until the end of Orcus's next turn. Creatures in that area have vulnerability to necrotic damage.
actions.name: Creeping Death (Costs 2 Actions)

damageImmunities: necrotic, poison; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing that is nonmagical
name: Orcus [MoM]

specialTraits.description: If Orcus fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

specialTraits.description: Orcus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance

specialTraits.description: Orcus can cast animate dead (at will) and create undead (3/day). He chooses the level at which the spells are cast, and the creatures created by them remain under his control indefinitely. Additionally, he can cast create undead even when it isn't night.
specialTraits.name: Master of Undeath

specialTraits.description: Orcus wields the Wand of Orcus.
specialTraits.name: Special Equipment
